title: Homeopathy, Herbalist, Crystals, Astrologer ,Kinesiologist, Reiki Canberra | The Hierophant, Centre for Healing and Learning | Griffith ACT Australia
description: Homeopathy, herbalist & wellbeing clinic, The Hierophant. Our skilled practitioners offer healing modalities including Kinesiology, Reiki, Acupressure, Astrology, Tarot. Shop online or visit us at one of the largest homeopathic and herbal medicine dispensaries in Australia, in Griffith, Canberra ACT
cleaned_text: top of page Our Story The Hierophant has proudly served the community for more than 35 years. You can browse the shop to discover one of Australia's largest ranges of natural remedies, or find something special from a selection of incense, candles, books, crystals and fine jewellery. Our skilled [practitioners](https://www.thehierophant.com.au/practitioners) offer a range of healing modalities including [Homeopathic](https://www.thehierophant.com.au/homeopathics) and Herbal treatments, Allergy Testing, life and wellness coaching, and other services. Our experienced team regularly conducts complementary therapy information sessions and workshops. Consultations are available at the Clinic and on Zoom. bottom of page
